title: (x) Culturgest display sans - Lux Sans {Chester}
content:
Very Martin Majoor Scala “flavoured”. What’s this?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=JOYOSA.gif)
author: adriano

comments.content: Says Majoor to me too… but it’s more decorative than Scala

That’s a couple of weights of Lux Sans by Greg Lindy of Lux Typographics.  
http://vllg.com/Lux/LuxSans/mudTyper+Weights/
Yep, \*slaps my head\* I knew that CAP B was on my minds background :P Thanks Chester!
